a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.

g.text: South and South-East Asia (MPD)South and South-East Asia (MPD)

text.tspan: Data source: Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
